title: What are the differences between Bitcoin and Ethereum
body:
对于不同之处，我在这里总结了一些：

首先，虽然现在以太坊和比特币都使用PoW，但是今年以太坊会升级到ETH2，使用PoS，他们的挖矿算法和之前不同，比特币使用SHA-256，以太坊使用Ethash。

其次，以太坊的出块时间更短。比特币出块需要 10 分钟，以太坊大约需要 14 秒。

第三，以太坊的块大小较小，有时可能会发生变化，而比特币是固定的。现阶段比特币的区块大小约为 1MB，可存储约 2000 笔交易，而以太坊则为几百 KB，包含约 400 笔交易。

其次，对于 ETH 和 BTC，发行方式和数量是不同的。BTC 的产量每四年减半，直到总产量达到 2100 万。ETH 的区块奖励会根据情况而减少。虽然一个区块的 ETH 奖励从 5 降低到 3 ，再降低到 2 ，但 ETH 没有发行上限。在 ETH2 的 PoS 之后，发行方式也将发生巨大的变化。

最后一个，以太坊使用 EVM 运行智能合约。这是图灵完备的，而比特币不是。

title: DAOTOOL101 #11:  Token-Gated Communities with Collab.Land Bot
body:
*Author(s): zerohash | Tet#7609*

*Editor(s): koala | koala#4988*

*Last updated: 30th May 2022*


***

## What is the Collab.Land bot?

Collab.Land is a Discord bot that is used for community-management via a token-gated system. The bot verifies the user’s ownership of any digital assets and provide them exclusive channel and role access if they own the particular asset.

The Collab.Land bot works in toggle mode where it is capable of automatically give/take channel and role privilege:

* The bot give verified user the role and channel access if they do own the particular digital asset - this is the token-gated community management system.
* The bot revokes these special channel and role access if the user sells, transfers, or loses their digital assets from the wallet in any way.
* Verified members are also able to tip each other using the bot within the community - in the form of their verified digital asset.

Automation is king in today’s working environment. The same applies to all the decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) and communities across the web3 ecosystem that are scaling at an incredible rate. To manually verify the ownership authenticity of every user is an impossibility and thus, Collab.Land bot is the automated solution that every community needs.

The bot allows community managers to utilize the open-access on-chain data of digital assets in assigning channel and role permission within Discord. This dissolves the need for manual labour of assigning channel and role privilege. As such, the bot enables community to scale efficiently via an automated verification system which is highly customizable by each community manager.

## What happens under the hood?

The bot requires users to link their Discord account to their wallet. Using user-signed messages that are gas-free in nature, it verifies that the user owns the particular wallet they are connecting. Once a user has been verified, the bot checks the connected wallet for pre-specified digital assets, pre-specified by the community manager, to assign the user their role and channel privilege. If no pre-specified digital asset is found in the connected wallet, privilege will not be assigned to the user.

Users will only have to connect their wallet once for each server. Once this verification is complete, the bot will assign them any future roles and channel privilege that is programmed by the community manager. As there is a constant verification process, the bot is able to revoke any assigned role and channel privilege if a user loses the digital asset from their wallet.


***

## Discord Integration

### Server setup

1\. Create a discord server if you don’t have one yet. Follow [this guide](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206143407) if you need help creating a Discord server.

2\. Invite the bot to your newly created server. You can invite the bot to your server with [this link](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=704521096837464076&scope=bot&permissions=8). Make sure the bot has Administrator permission.

![Inviting Collab.Land bot to a private server. ](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2F02ys_3ShS6qIK-dpaMKJn.png&w=828&q=90)

3\. Adding the bot automatically creates the Collab.Land role for the bot. Arrange this role so that it has the highest authority in terms of role hierarchy.

![Collab.Land bot role should be the highest!](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Fix_TBLS3K_iPJOTaVsdXG.png&w=1920&q=90)

4\. Create a private channel that disallows `everyone` to access. This private channel only allow those that are `verified` to access. This is the key to token-gating a community!

![Set the channel private and only allow verified users to access it. ](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FwpS8hYE5OPkNVOUHMXYS8.png&w=1080&q=90)

### Configuring Collab.Land bot for your Discord server

1\. In the `#collabland-config` channel, enter `!setup role` to begin the gateway role setup. React according with the corresponding emoji on which blockchain your token is deployed from. For the demo, we will use the `$PEOPLE` token from Ethereum mainnet.

![React with the corresponding emoji for your blockchain of choice.](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FweDkicHbuWUI2BgxGbA85.png&w=1920&q=90)

2\. Next, choose the token standard of your token. This can be ERC-20, ERC-721, ERC-1155 and etc. Since we are using `$PEOPLE` token, it will be ERC-20 token standard.

![React with the corresponding emoji for your token standard.](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FrHANF3C_GX5QrJB-i4LLC.png&w=1080&q=90)

3\. We are now going to set up the token by specifying its contract address, token amount to qualify for the role, set a maximum cap on number of tokens, as well as the role that is assigned for whoever that qualifies.

![](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FzP1Z0lgfyPqkp3wR5syhH.png&w=1920&q=90)

```
0x7A58c0Be72BE218B41C608b7Fe7C5bB630736C71 1000 -1 @Verified
```

So here’s a little breakdown. Using `$PEOPLE` token, we will have to specify its token contract address, [which can be found here](https://etherscan.io/token/0x7a58c0be72be218b41c608b7fe7c5bb630736c71?a=0x6e5cc01c94ffab8a1db9e70a8cac19767f239443). Next, we specify we need people to hold a minimum of **1000** token to qualify for the role, but we do not put a maximum cap on this. Once these 3 criteria are fulfilled, they are given the `@Verified` role to access token-gated channels and etc.

If we are using NFT token standard such as POAP, ERC-721, or ERC-1155, there will be a fifth parameter for us to specify, which is the token ID from the NFT collection.

4\. Lastly, you just need to direct users to your gateway channel to verify their assets in the `#Verification` channel by clicking the `Let’s go` button, which will open a browser pop-up for external site verification using their self-custodial wallet (ie. MetaMask, WalletConnect and etc.)

![Click "Let's go" and "Connect wallet" to verify your assets and get roled!](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Fq2zSDUy64e7uv4E2pg2qM.png&w=1920&q=90)

5\. Go to the browser pop-up and get verified. Make sure the website is the collab.land website.

![Website is https://connect.collab.land/](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FrIanJvKzBvivFMqnGxBhV.png&w=3840&q=90)


***

## Summary

Collab.Land bot is one of the key tools in DAO and the overall web3 ecosystem for managing user privileges. It is used widely across almost all the communities and has not seen a breach in security at the time of writing. It is highly recommended for communities to adopt the use of Collab.Land bot to automate holder verification in their system.

title: Introducing PowerPool Research
body:
Today we are excited to publicly announce a research group funded by PowerPool DAO and a brand new publication blog for PowerPool research materials on mirror.xyz.

> *We aim to adopt various DeSci (Decentralized Science) tools over time and make our research web3-native and compatible with modern research principles.*

PowerPool Research was created inside PowerPool DAO more than a year ago to solve problems that every protocol faces: on-chain data collection & visualization, building simulation models, product prototyping, stress-testing, exploring, and understanding novel Defi primitives.

## Why do we announce it publicly? What’s the goal of this announcement?

We stand for **open-source collaboration** for solving mechanism design, simulations, and protocol economic security problems in Defi.

> This announcement is the start of our collaboration journey with other protocols and research DAOs

We aim to make public the models’ source code, input data, dashboards/queries for its collection, methodology, report articles, and other materials. In our opinion, collaboration and the opportunity to review results together is a great added value for researchers, protocols, and the community.

Our opinion is that Web3 (and Defi in particular) needs much more research contribution than is currently provided by well-known research agencies and companies which work mainly in a closed-source paradigm, publishing only parts of their results and models.

## Aims, goals, and philosophy of operation

The ***main aim*** of PowerPool Research is to deliver ***quality research results, simulations, and data-backed answers*** to important questions for PowerPool and other projects.

**Our goals:**

1. Establish collaboration with relevant projects and research DAOs in the space
2. Carry out simulations, product prototyping, and data analysis
3. Publish models, input data, and research results
4. Contribute to robustness and safety of protocols and products

Talking about web3 engineering philosophy, here is a good [article](https://medium.com/token-engineering-commons/engineering-ethics-in-web3-18d981278018) from Michael Zagrham on this topic. It comes down to Engineering Values, such as focusing on safety, forecasting side effects, deep involvement, putting best effort, and responsibility.

PowerPool more and more focuses on the PowerAgent on-chain automation network rather than building Defi products for the end-customers. According to it, we have an aim to contribute to products automated by PowerAgent from the research/data analytics/stress-testing side.

## Principles of collaboration

The main idea of collaboration is to generate value together. According to this, we have the following rules of collaboration:

1. PowerPool Research selects joint research topics with a focus to improve/prototyping protocols or products PowerPool has integration or relation to/ or solving important Defi problem
2. PowerPool Research is a public open-source research group that works with other projects free of charge. PowerPool DAO covers all expenses - such as the time and efforts of PowerPool contributors.

Thus, we ***publicly announce*** each research case we start to explore, with a problem statement, and other important facts **prior to starting the job**.

We ask for ***reciprocity*** from our collaborators, which includes (besides participation in the research process) at least a Twitter announcement and some other activity when results are delivered, listed below:

\-> **Participation** in a joint article summarizing up results, and helping with finding and attracting candidates for peer review
\-> A **repost** of the PowerPool Twitter storm with the results with a comment from the collaborator's side + original tweets covering research results
\-> A **community call** to discuss results

## The team

PowerPool Research team consists of several contributors right now:

1. **Vasily Sumanov, the group leader**  
 Head of Research, Ph.D.  joined crypto space in 2013 as an enthusiast, contributing full-time to the space since 2017.

   Contributing to Token Engineering, simulations, mechanism design, and Defi. In recent years Vasily had been researching AMMs and cryptoeconomic patterns. Besides PowerPool, recent contributions include work with Balancer Labs on Python AMM models and data collection for several Defi projects.
2. Princess Luna - “one line of code to simulate them all” 
 Python expert with physics academic background that decided to contribute his skills to web3 research problems.
3. **Sky Strifer. An intelligence agency for on-chain data.**  
 Dune Analytics and Bigquery ninja, Data Engineer, crypto, and venture enthusiast. 
 MSc. in Applied Mathematics & Physics.
4. **Adelie Penguin. Junior Researcher.**
   Master's student in physics, engineer, and full-time crypto nerd. Adelie builds simulation models and explores novel cryptoeconomic primitives and systems.

## Recent research cases and results

PowerPool Research was initially launched to support PowerPool products from the research side. Here are our latest research topics:

### Exploring and simulating approaches for determining the optimal composition of several Yearn.finance yield-generation vault indices based on on-chain data.

The main goal of the experiment was to understand is there an option to create an algorithm efficiently updating the basket of yVaults to maximize APY for yield-generating investment strategies (Vaults) with constantly changing yield due to environmental factors.

We made an attempt to find patterns in Vault LP share growth and ‘catch’ harvests and yield-compounding events for the hypothetical algorithm of basket rebalancing. For this purpose we collected on-chain data, visualized it, and backtested several algorithms:

![Figure 1. Visualization of yVaults token price and velocity for MIM, FRAX, USDN, alUSD, and mUSD](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NaDhuYtjyeglrwrAuaNIS.png?height=524&width=1328)

The price velocity chart indicates harvesting & compounding events. The outcome of this research is that there is no patterns or algorithm for efficient capital re-allocation to capture harvesting events for yVaults basket. The model code & input data is [published](https://github.com/powerpool-finance/powerpool-research/tree/main/YearnVaultsSimulation) on Github.

### Developing a capital-efficient StableSwap LUSD pool on top of Balancer v2, Liquity, and B.Protocol using automated asset managers.

PowerPool historically builds on top and contributes to Balancer Protocol. When Curve Wars started in autumn 2021, we decided to build StableSwap pool on top of Balancer v2 that can fund itself without hugely relying on ‘thin-air-printed’ token rewards.

Liquity protocol LUSD stablecoin has a unique feature to re-direct all liquidation cashflows to LUSD token holders. Using this option and some other composability tricks, we developed an idea of the staBAL-LUSD pool that evolves to LUSD-a-bb-USD pool, built on top of Balancer v2, Liquity, and B.Protocol:

![Figure 2. The principal scheme of hypothetical (simulated) LUSD-a-bb-USD pool operation and its evolution from the initial staBAL-LUSD concept.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FwcVUOZn2sjtasuoZwce7.png?height=500&width=1442)

We modeled the pool as **if it actually operated on the mainnet** during the experiment and tracked the evolution of balances and trading volumes. It also included liquidations in Liquity Stability Pool, liquidity mining rewards in third-party protocols (BAL, LQTY) that we can bring to the pool utilizing asset managers, and many more.

![Figure 3. The visualization of LUSD-a-bb-USD pool operation: the pool composition (balances), liquidations, and simulated trading volume.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1DFYHKpsVlKiupvVz3YvW.png?height=712&width=1161)

The results were outstanding - this pool could generate **12% APY** in stable market conditions and up to **40% APY (25% monthly)** while the market is going downside **without additional token rewards**:

![Figure 4. LUSD-a-bb-USD bi-weekly calculated APR and its dependence on ETH price movements and yield sources allocation.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KKrwtvBfgwU2N0MsX57zP.jpg?height=1059&width=1079)

We published two articles[\[1\]](https://github.com/powerpool-finance/powerpool-research/tree/main/LUSDaUsdStablePool),[\[2\]](https://medium.com/powerpool/powerpool-introduces-first-yield-harvesting-stableswap-pool-built-using-balancer-v2-and-liquity-fed206e734b6) with results and a Github [repository](https://medium.com/powerpool/enhancing-yield-and-capital-efficiency-of-balancer-v2-liquity-lusd-pool-model-d2357cf839aa).

### Determining the parameters for optimal $TORN autocompounding in an automated governance staking vault built on top of tornado.cash.

Since one of PowerPool products is PowerAgent on-chain automation network we decided to build a smart vault for staking $TORN into tornado.cash governance staking contract.

The main issue that we need to solve was the **stochastic nature** of rewards which means that if we want to maximize compounding interest by spending a reasonable amount of gas we need to explore data and create a harvesting & compounding strategy.

For this purpose, we collected data since the new $TORN tokenomics and governance contract was launched, explored it, and propose optimal vault operation conditions.

![Figure 5. $TORN rewards daily: visualization of TORN governance staking contract on-chain data.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/h5Z9m9xtW4lugqmvL3__a.png?height=802&width=1204)

![Figure 6. Simulation of vault operation with 200,000 TORN staked; gas-adjusted profit, and gas spending.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/C2f_IbYsSN4BMlm_5pgM8.png?height=1000&width=1566)

We determined optimal operational conditions for vaults with various amounts of TORN staked taking into account real network conditions such as gas pricing.

Results are published on PowerPool resources[\[3\]](https://gov.powerpool.finance/t/proposal-53-a-smart-vault-for-tornado-cash-governance-staking/1212),[\[4\]](https://medium.com/powerpool/introducing-pptorn-an-auto-compounding-strategy-for-tornado-cash-torn-governance-staking-1bd8d78e64a0), and [Github](https://github.com/powerpool-finance/powerpool-research/tree/main/TornadoAutocompoundResearch).

Several other cases are now **in progress**, including the very important topic of **on-chain automation** (on-chain networks, signer selection algorithms, and cryptoeconomic models of operation).

## Let’s research together

We are open to research collaboration with other protocols, persons, and entities. Please, reach out to PowerPool Research's [Twitter](https://twitter.com/pwrpl_research) or research@powerpool.finance.

title: 常用跨链桥使用评述
body:
**一、说明：**

1. 因我非技术人员，对于各个桥的技术来源没有特别了解，仅仅从界面，使用方便，费用等方面谈自己的使用心得。主观性较强，仅仅供参考；
2. 对于目前市场上的主流跨链桥基本均使用五次以上，也制作了excel表格，并在收藏夹制作专门一栏“跨链桥”，因此，应该具有一定的发言权；
3. 一般跨链时均是单币种跨链，未在跨链后改变币种，因此，对于跨链后改变币种的没有特别了解；

* 目前使用过的跨链桥有

  ```
  sol系：wormhole（portalbridge）,swim，
  ```

```
cosmos系：rango.exchange    
```

非官方跨链桥：

**cbride, connext, hop, li.finance, bungee(movr), debridge, relaychain, nomad,   mosaic, via ，hyphen,iswap**

交易所跨链到二层网络：**layerswap**

官方跨链桥：

**optics, bridge.terra.money**

zk跨链桥

**orbiter**

**二、使用跨链桥基本技巧：**

1. 在使用跨链桥前先打开debank，这样跨链之后你就可以直观看到跨链资产是否到账；
2. 会在浏览器上看交易hash
3. 会在小狐狸钱包上添加token的地址（本人将常用的各链token制作了一个文档，方便随时添加到小狐狸钱包）

   <https://mirror.xyz/ohweb3.eth/DKIRLxr5u6p9_jH-wpBhldxXhnR3aLidUqYHcbplD1A>
4. 会在小狐狸上添加各链并在各链间自由切换
5. 会使用各链的去中心化交易所
6. 涉及到不通EVM的跨链要较熟练使用不同公链的钱包，比如sol的phantom钱包，cosmos的kelpr钱包,terra的terra钱包等等
7. 出现问题要及时到官方的discord群或者tel群进行反馈和沟通，一般都会得到耐心的解决。
8. 跨链的费用不大一样，不过基本相差不大，有几家特别贵的会指出来。

**三、使用心得**

1. **wormhole（portal）**

支持跨链数量：多，较完整，

速度：看不同的链

界面：较复杂

是否能看到跨链历史记录：不能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：不支持

这恐怕是我目前使用起来最难受的一个跨链桥了，几个问题：

首先、因为这个桥涉及到他们自己铸造的token(比如bsc上的wormusdc等），需要自己添加到钱包中，或者到支持的去中心交易所中兑换成主流的token,所以很别扭。

第二，需要会看各链的浏览器，看马蹄币安浏览器还好，看sol的浏览器看的很辛苦。

第三，跨链速度比较慢，特别是马蹄要跨到sol链，经常出问题，出问题后，要把当时交易的hash复制出来，然后到wormhole上去random，否则就得自己去链上找，这对新手小白是很难受的事情。

第四，交易成功后是包装的代币，只有在sol对应的交易所可以1:1兑换成真实的代币，而在币安的交易所兑换成真实代币，则客损金额较大。比如500个包装的wormusdc就只能换成490个左右真实的usdc，让人赶紧很不舒服。

第五，有时候交易成功后，界面只显示交易成功，并不显示你交易后的代币可以去哪里交换成真实代币（有时候又有显示）。

总之，对于一家获得很多融资的团队来说，虽然技术过硬，但是做出来的产品并不那么让人容易操作，这是不应该的。不过团队有钱，也有好多资源。希望能够改进交易。

**建议：使用sol和币安跨虫洞的链，速度会快一些**

跨到sol链后的wormtoken可以到以下网站jup.aq换成真实的usdc或usdt

[https://jup.ag/](https://jup.ag/)

而且，以下是整理的wormhole的token（不一定完整）

[https://mirror.xyz/ohweb3.eth/1pGzsQXOT2xmITJ7xeRjVqzeB8xQIXNTRFp5jd6d4Yk](https://mirror.xyz/ohweb3.eth/1pGzsQXOT2xmITJ7xeRjVqzeB8xQIXNTRFp5jd6d4Yk)

**2.  swim**

支持跨链数量：主链，bsc，sol

速度：快

界面：有点复杂

是否能看到跨链历史记录：不能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：不支持

简单评述：和大多数bridge不同，swim是通过将代币“add”成自己的交易所代币，然后在“remove”出到相应的链上，虽然交易方式稍微复杂（涉及到add和move),但只要稍微熟悉之后，使用起来还是很方便的，特别是速度很快。虽然现在只支持币安，主链和sol。据说也是用的wormhole底层技术，也是wormhole主页推荐的交易所，不过使用起来还是比较方便的，并且最终转换后的代币是真实代币，不需要再去交易所过一手。

**3. rango.exchange**

据说是cosmos团队开发的跨链桥，就支持的链来说，恐怕可以说是跨链之王了，支持除sol之外的各链及二层（主链，bsc,matic,harmony,ar, comos系各链）。刚出来的时候曾经准备尝试，但其界面复杂，而且因为太全，据“微博主十一地主”实测存在很多问题，因此没有使用。现在的界面看起来似乎好了很多，有机会跨链看看

**4.cbridge**

支持跨链数量：多，较完整，支持二层（不支持xdai）

速度：一般（五分钟左右）

界面：简单，清楚

是否能看到跨链历史记录：能，并且是在pendind的地方直接看到history,可以很清楚看到自己的交易记录。

出现跨链问题的解决：暂未遇到

使用起来较为丝滑，不过需要20U以上才能跨链，在跨链时显示“pending”,目前未遇到跨链不成功的情况。上面可以看到自己的交易历史，这对那个啥是很好用的(懂的就好），另外，有添加流动性功能，需要500U以上

**5.connext(原为xpollinate)**

支持跨链数量：多，较完整，

速度：快

界面：简单，好看

是否能看到跨链历史记录：能，

出现跨链问题的解决：暂未遇到

简单评论：原先使用较多，最近使用少了，作为原生的跨链桥，界面非常清楚，使用起来也比较方便，而且较少出现问题。同时，在交易的时候显示的页面也比较好看，速度比较快。更重要的是，在跨链成功后，它会提示你确认跨链成功，**并且一键点击换到自己跨的链上去，并且一键点击将资产添加到钱包（这点很贴心，也很实用）**。还有交易显示功能，会显示自己的跨链交易记录（这功能也应该是跨链桥应该要具备的功能）。

**6.hop**

就跨链而言，hop使用起来还是比较顺畅的，而且费用也比较低。不过这次airdrop事件得罪了很多人。团队从airdrop的“鼓励举报”到制订的空投标准都有问题。本来想写篇长文骂他的，算了。正事要紧。

[https://mirror.xyz/ohweb3.eth/uYR9LBZRGqQz_4fSOns3vSoT1oB4XByi1JRM8hhhE1w](https://mirror.xyz/ohweb3.eth/uYR9LBZRGqQz_4fSOns3vSoT1oB4XByi1JRM8hhhE1w)

**7. li**

支持跨链数量：多，较完整，

速度：较快，

界面：简单，清楚

是否能看到跨链历史记录：能，

出现跨链问题的解决：会出现长期不到账的情况，且没有显示解决办法，让人有所担心

简单评论：好像是跨链桥的聚合，界面简单，而且费用较低，不过就是**偶尔出现很长时间不到账**，同时，由于长时间不到账，页面也没有显示可以操作的步骤，会让人比较担心。还有，就是跨链后，它会提示可以到dashboard查看自己的资产，个人认为不是很有必要，跨链桥没有必要集成资产情况（又不是debank等资产聚合器）。可以到discord里面和support寻求帮助。它也是通过hop或connext进行跨链的，可以到相应的地址去查。如果三天没有跨成，资产会回到自己原先跨链的账上。另外，在bridge成功到账后，li.finance界面上会显示”resume”，这时候可以点击，就会显示sucess。

还有一个很扯淡的事：有时候用Li.finance跨链（会自己选择anyswap跨链），跨链之后会变成any的代币，还必须到anyswap的官网找机会withdraw出来。anyswap官网

app.multichain.org/#/pool/add

**8.bungee**

支持跨链数量：多，较完整，

速度：一般

界面：简单，清楚，可以让点击交易hash记录

是否能看到跨链历史记录：能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：支持

简单评论：好像也是一个聚合bridge的平台,而且可以让你选择通过cbridge或者anyswap来跨链，整个页面看起来比较清楚简单，费用也比较低，完成后会显示“done”，显示时间约20分钟（不过一般不会那么久）。好像支持的团队socket比较牛逼。

存在问题：有时候使用anyswap跨链后会出现和li.finance一样的问题，跨链后会变成any的代币（比如anyeth或者anyusdc）,需要到anyswap的官网上withdraw出来。

**bungee支持加油（refuel）功能，可以直接将一条链上的gas加油成另外一条链上的gas(比如说，把polygan链上的matic转成币安链上的btc,再也不用去从其他钱包调了，也不用从交易所转了）真是实用的功能（上次在和imtoken做任务时就有这个任务）点赞！！！！！**

**9.debridge**

支持跨链数量：一般

速度：一般

界面：一般

是否能看到跨链历史记录：不能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：不支持

费用：这条链如果不使用自己的跨链代币，跨链成本很高

简单评述：这个跨链桥好像也涉及到自己的跨链代币deusdc的问题。如果不选择这个跨链代币，则费用很高，但是如果选择这个选择跨链代币跨链后，还需要到支持的去中心交易所里把deusdc换成常用的usdc才能正常交易。所以这对于小白来说是比较讨厌的。之前debridge和avax在做活动的时候，就造成很多人不理解费用为什么这么高。不过这种跨链代币对使用者来说不是好的使用体验。

**10.relaychain——不推荐**

不知道这个团队在想什么，跨链的gas费在5-10刀（gas费！！！）到discord和团队反馈，他们觉得这个费用并不高。转了一次后果断不再用。也没有看到这家跨链桥的团队及融资情况

**11.nomad**

目前只有moonbeam和主链之间的跨链，暂时没有使用

**12.mosaic**

支持跨链数量：不算多，支持moonriver，不支持op,xdai等

速度：较快

界面：清楚

是否能看到跨链历史记录：能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：支持

界面有点奇怪，每次都是显示从ETH开始跨链，而且没有直接变更链的功能，要一个个自己点击有点麻烦，有时候看不到自己的token，不过可以看到自己的跨链记录，费用不高，速度也挺快

**13.via**

支持跨链数量：多，较完整，

速度：一般

界面：设计风格不错

是否能看到跨链历史记录：不能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：支持

费用低，速度也快（好像也是聚合的跨链桥），不过在跨链交易对手方面把所有的资产放在一起让人选择，界面不是那么清楚，不够简单上。有一两次跨链之后检查到账情况，发现实际到账的金额比via显示的金额要少，不知道是不是via有点骗人呢。不过可以选择跨链后转账地址的功能，这个功能还是比较实用。

**14.hyphen—赞**

支持跨链数量：不多，eth,avax,bnb,polygon

速度：飞速

界面：简单，清楚

是否能看到跨链历史记录：不能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：支持

跨链费用：低，滑点低

biconomy交易所支持的跨链桥和存储，界面简单，费用低，存储的pools的apy也不低。特别是跨链速度，可以说是目前使用的跨链桥中速度最快的了。目前只碰到过一次大概花了二三十分钟的时候，正常不到一分钟跨链完成。就是有时候matic会连不上，不知道是链的问题，还是跨链桥本身的问题。

**15.chainhop**

支持跨链数量：一般

速度：一般

界面：比较清新

是否能看到跨链历史记录：能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：不支持

费用：这条跨链的磨损较高，而且好像和金额有关系（补充：20220530最近手续费速速下降到和其他的跨链桥费用差不多了）

简单评论：页面整体还是比较整洁的，速度也还可以，页面上直接显示跨链的时间在5-20分钟，不过费用似乎高一点。不过交易完成后有显示可以点击变更链的按键和点击查看交易历史的按键，这点还是比较实用的。

**16. iswap**

支持跨链数量：一般

速度：一般

界面：比较清新

是否能看到跨链历史记录：能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：不支持

简单评述：最近（20220530）刚刚兴起的一家跨链桥，刚开的discord，。从域名和界面上看像是国人的项目（目前在谷歌等找不到关于项目的融资，团队等具体情况，推特注册地址为新加坡），不过使用起来速度确实很快（和官方介绍一样秒到，不到一分钟）。手续费超过1000U跨链的话有点高了，大概5U左右，100U以内金额手续费用非常低。

**15. orbiter**

这个不得不说一下。因为是支持跨链到zksync二层的唯一的非官方跨链桥了。而且速度非常之快。但是这几天有人说，这个跨链桥不是去中心化的，是私人地址转账，而且合约也没有审计过，担心后面转账只进不出。只好暂时不用了。discord中也没有官方或管理员的回应。

**16.layerswap**

这是从交易所直接跨链到二层网络的目前唯一的跨链桥了。使用过，虽然稍显麻烦，但是对于节省gas费，特别是zk网络的gas费，是很好用的。不过如果以后交易所都直接支持二层网络，可能这个跨链桥的价值也就没有了。

**17，zerion,zapper**

这两个其实主要功能不是跨链桥，而是一个资产投资组合，但其中都聚合了跨链的功能。相比较而言，zapper的跨链体验（包括exchange体验）都要更好一些。

这两天试用了一下这两个桥

zerion的集成功能有时候不大好使。包括exchange和bridge,点击之后，并不会出现自己钱包中token的具体数字,导致无法exchange和bride

这两个桥都有一个问题，bridge之后恢复原状，对跨链后的结果没有任何的提示，导致你可能搞不清楚自己到底跨链成功没有，只能在debank里面查看。

**18.stargate.finance**

支持跨链数量：一般（但包括了主要二层和主要公链）

速度：快

界面：比较清新

是否能看到跨链历史记录：能

是否支持跨链到不同地址：不支持

注：只支持稳定币跨链

简单评述：界面非常简洁，而且上面清楚的显示可能的桥接时间，桥后会显示已经成功。支持的团队layerzero本身就是跨链的底层协议。因此，其开发的跨链桥stargate.finance用起来丝丝顺滑，虽然已经发币，但是layerzero有可能还有空投机会

**——用stargate跨链U是最便宜的，没有之一**

**官方跨链桥就不说了。**

title: DAOTOOL101 #11:  Token-Gated Communities with Collab.Land Bot
body:
*Author(s): zerohash | Tet#7609*

*Editor(s): koala | koala#4988*

*Last updated: 30th May 2022*


***

## What is the Collab.Land bot?

Collab.Land is a Discord bot that is used for community-management via a token-gated system. The bot verifies the user’s ownership of any digital assets and provide them exclusive channel and role access if they own the particular asset.

The Collab.Land bot works in toggle mode where it is capable of automatically give/take channel and role privilege:

* The bot give verified user the role and channel access if they do own the particular digital asset - this is the token-gated community management system.
* The bot revokes these special channel and role access if the user sells, transfers, or loses their digital assets from the wallet in any way.
* Verified members are also able to tip each other using the bot within the community - in the form of their verified digital asset.

Automation is king in today’s working environment. The same applies to all the decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) and communities across the web3 ecosystem that are scaling at an incredible rate. To manually verify the ownership authenticity of every user is an impossibility and thus, Collab.Land bot is the automated solution that every community needs.

The bot allows community managers to utilize the open-access on-chain data of digital assets in assigning channel and role permission within Discord. This dissolves the need for manual labour of assigning channel and role privilege. As such, the bot enables community to scale efficiently via an automated verification system which is highly customizable by each community manager.

## What happens under the hood?

The bot requires users to link their Discord account to their wallet. Using user-signed messages that are gas-free in nature, it verifies that the user owns the particular wallet they are connecting. Once a user has been verified, the bot checks the connected wallet for pre-specified digital assets, pre-specified by the community manager, to assign the user their role and channel privilege. If no pre-specified digital asset is found in the connected wallet, privilege will not be assigned to the user.

Users will only have to connect their wallet once for each server. Once this verification is complete, the bot will assign them any future roles and channel privilege that is programmed by the community manager. As there is a constant verification process, the bot is able to revoke any assigned role and channel privilege if a user loses the digital asset from their wallet.


***

## Discord Integration

### Server setup

1\. Create a discord server if you don’t have one yet. Follow [this guide](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206143407) if you need help creating a Discord server.

2\. Invite the bot to your newly created server. You can invite the bot to your server with [this link](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=704521096837464076&scope=bot&permissions=8). Make sure the bot has Administrator permission.

![Inviting Collab.Land bot to a private server. ](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2F02ys_3ShS6qIK-dpaMKJn.png&w=828&q=90)

3\. Adding the bot automatically creates the Collab.Land role for the bot. Arrange this role so that it has the highest authority in terms of role hierarchy.

![Collab.Land bot role should be the highest!](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Fix_TBLS3K_iPJOTaVsdXG.png&w=1920&q=90)

4\. Create a private channel that disallows `everyone` to access. This private channel only allow those that are `verified` to access. This is the key to token-gating a community!

![Set the channel private and only allow verified users to access it. ](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FwpS8hYE5OPkNVOUHMXYS8.png&w=1080&q=90)

### Configuring Collab.Land bot for your Discord server

1\. In the `#collabland-config` channel, enter `!setup role` to begin the gateway role setup. React according with the corresponding emoji on which blockchain your token is deployed from. For the demo, we will use the `$PEOPLE` token from Ethereum mainnet.

![React with the corresponding emoji for your blockchain of choice.](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FweDkicHbuWUI2BgxGbA85.png&w=1920&q=90)

2\. Next, choose the token standard of your token. This can be ERC-20, ERC-721, ERC-1155 and etc. Since we are using `$PEOPLE` token, it will be ERC-20 token standard.

![React with the corresponding emoji for your token standard.](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FrHANF3C_GX5QrJB-i4LLC.png&w=1080&q=90)

3\. We are now going to set up the token by specifying its contract address, token amount to qualify for the role, set a maximum cap on number of tokens, as well as the role that is assigned for whoever that qualifies.

![](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FzP1Z0lgfyPqkp3wR5syhH.png&w=1920&q=90)

```
0x7A58c0Be72BE218B41C608b7Fe7C5bB630736C71 1000 -1 @Verified
```

So here’s a little breakdown. Using `$PEOPLE` token, we will have to specify its token contract address, [which can be found here](https://etherscan.io/token/0x7a58c0be72be218b41c608b7fe7c5bb630736c71?a=0x6e5cc01c94ffab8a1db9e70a8cac19767f239443). Next, we specify we need people to hold a minimum of **1000** token to qualify for the role, but we do not put a maximum cap on this. Once these 3 criteria are fulfilled, they are given the `@Verified` role to access token-gated channels and etc.

If we are using NFT token standard such as POAP, ERC-721, or ERC-1155, there will be a fifth parameter for us to specify, which is the token ID from the NFT collection.

4\. Lastly, you just need to direct users to your gateway channel to verify their assets in the `#Verification` channel by clicking the `Let’s go` button, which will open a browser pop-up for external site verification using their self-custodial wallet (ie. MetaMask, WalletConnect and etc.)

![Click "Let's go" and "Connect wallet" to verify your assets and get roled!](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Fq2zSDUy64e7uv4E2pg2qM.png&w=1920&q=90)

5\. Go to the browser pop-up and get verified. Make sure the website is the collab.land website.

![Website is https://connect.collab.land/](https://mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FrIanJvKzBvivFMqnGxBhV.png&w=3840&q=90)


***

## Summary

Collab.Land bot is one of the key tools in DAO and the overall web3 ecosystem for managing user privileges. It is used widely across almost all the communities and has not seen a breach in security at the time of writing. It is highly recommended for communities to adopt the use of Collab.Land bot to automate holder verification in their system.

title: はじめてのWriting NFT
body:
メルマガからwriting NFTについて流れてきたので，とりあえず登録．

絵を書いたり，音楽作ったりは苦手ですが，文章を書くのは10年以上続けているため，ようやくフィールドが広がってきているような気がします．

医療や研究について，わかりやすく伝えることをモットーにして，いろいろな人にもっと健康や科学について知ってもらいたいと思って始めました．

仕事柄，健康に気づかっていないとヤバいことになるのは，よく経験するので，皆さん健康にも投資しましょう．

最近ではようやく政府も重い腰を上げて，予防医学に対して控除なども始まっているので，これから役立つのではないでしょうか？

「わたしはまだ若いから大丈夫」と思っていても，想像以上に生活習慣を変えるのは大変です．ほとんどの方は，結婚・出産・病気などのライフ・イベントをきっかけに健康と向き合うかもしれません．ただ，病気になってから生活習慣を変えるってかなり大変．

病気のために，仕事を辞めたり，離婚したり，決してレアな話ではありません．

同じ有酸素運動でも，週末2時間よりも，2日ごとに1回30分の方が効果的って知ってはいるケド，なかなか実践できないのがニンゲンです．

毎日コツコツ，多くの人が一番ニガテなコトが大切．

title: Introducing PowerPool Research
body:
Today we are excited to publicly announce a research group funded by PowerPool DAO and a brand new publication blog for PowerPool research materials on mirror.xyz.

> *We aim to adopt various DeSci (Decentralized Science) tools over time and make our research web3-native and compatible with modern research principles.*

PowerPool Research was created inside PowerPool DAO more than a year ago to solve problems that every protocol faces: on-chain data collection & visualization, building simulation models, product prototyping, stress-testing, exploring, and understanding novel Defi primitives.

## Why do we announce it publicly? What’s the goal of this announcement?

We stand for **open-source collaboration** for solving mechanism design, simulations, and protocol economic security problems in Defi.

> This announcement is the start of our collaboration journey with other protocols and research DAOs

We aim to make public the models’ source code, input data, dashboards/queries for its collection, methodology, report articles, and other materials. In our opinion, collaboration and the opportunity to review results together is a great added value for researchers, protocols, and the community.

Our opinion is that Web3 (and Defi in particular) needs much more research contribution than is currently provided by well-known research agencies and companies which work mainly in a closed-source paradigm, publishing only parts of their results and models.

## Aims, goals, and philosophy of operation

The ***main aim*** of PowerPool Research is to deliver ***quality research results, simulations, and data-backed answers*** to important questions for PowerPool and other projects.

**Our goals:**

1. Establish collaboration with relevant projects and research DAOs in the space
2. Carry out simulations, product prototyping, and data analysis
3. Publish models, input data, and research results
4. Contribute to robustness and safety of protocols and products

Talking about web3 engineering philosophy, here is a good [article](https://medium.com/token-engineering-commons/engineering-ethics-in-web3-18d981278018) from Michael Zagrham on this topic. It comes down to Engineering Values, such as focusing on safety, forecasting side effects, deep involvement, putting best effort, and responsibility.

PowerPool more and more focuses on the PowerAgent on-chain automation network rather than building Defi products for the end-customers. According to it, we have an aim to contribute to products automated by PowerAgent from the research/data analytics/stress-testing side.

## Principles of collaboration

The main idea of collaboration is to generate value together. According to this, we have the following rules of collaboration:

1. PowerPool Research selects joint research topics with a focus to improve/prototyping protocols or products PowerPool has integration or relation to/ or solving important Defi problem
2. PowerPool Research is a public open-source research group that works with other projects free of charge. PowerPool DAO covers all expenses - such as the time and efforts of PowerPool contributors.

Thus, we ***publicly announce*** each research case we start to explore, with a problem statement, and other important facts **prior to starting the job**.

We ask for ***reciprocity*** from our collaborators, which includes (besides participation in the research process) at least a Twitter announcement and some other activity when results are delivered, listed below:

\-> **Participation** in a joint article summarizing up results, and helping with finding and attracting candidates for peer review
\-> A **repost** of the PowerPool Twitter storm with the results with a comment from the collaborator's side + original tweets covering research results
\-> A **community call** to discuss results

## The team

PowerPool Research team consists of several contributors right now:

1. **Vasily Sumanov, the group leader**  
 Head of Research, Ph.D.  joined crypto space in 2013 as an enthusiast, contributing full-time to the space since 2017.

   Contributing to Token Engineering, simulations, mechanism design, and Defi. In recent years Vasily had been researching AMMs and cryptoeconomic patterns. Besides PowerPool, recent contributions include work with Balancer Labs on Python AMM models and data collection for several Defi projects.
2. **Princess Luna - “one line of code to simulate them all”** 
 Python expert with physics academic background that decided to contribute his skills to web3 research problems.
3. **Sky Strifer. An intelligence agency for on-chain data.**  
 Dune Analytics and Bigquery ninja, Data Engineer, crypto, and venture enthusiast. 
 MSc. in Applied Mathematics & Physics.
4. **Adelie Penguin. Junior Researcher.**
   Master's student in physics, engineer, and full-time crypto nerd. Adelie builds simulation models and explores novel cryptoeconomic primitives and systems.

## Recent research cases and results

PowerPool Research was initially launched to support PowerPool products from the research side. Here are our latest research topics:

### Exploring and simulating approaches for determining the optimal composition of several Yearn.finance yield-generation vault indices based on on-chain data.

The main goal of the experiment was to understand is there an option to create an algorithm efficiently updating the basket of yVaults to maximize APY for yield-generating investment strategies (Vaults) with constantly changing yield due to environmental factors.

We made an attempt to find patterns in Vault LP share growth and ‘catch’ harvests and yield-compounding events for the hypothetical algorithm of basket rebalancing. For this purpose we collected on-chain data, visualized it, and backtested several algorithms:

![Figure 1. Visualization of yVaults token price and velocity for MIM, FRAX, USDN, alUSD, and mUSD](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NaDhuYtjyeglrwrAuaNIS.png?height=524&width=1328)

The price velocity chart indicates harvesting & compounding events. The outcome of this research is that there is no patterns or algorithm for efficient capital re-allocation to capture harvesting events for yVaults basket. The model code & input data is [published](https://github.com/powerpool-finance/powerpool-research/tree/main/YearnVaultsSimulation) on Github.

### Developing a capital-efficient StableSwap LUSD pool on top of Balancer v2, Liquity, and B.Protocol using automated asset managers.

PowerPool historically builds on top and contributes to Balancer Protocol. When Curve Wars started in autumn 2021, we decided to build StableSwap pool on top of Balancer v2 that can fund itself without hugely relying on ‘thin-air-printed’ token rewards.

Liquity protocol LUSD stablecoin has a unique feature to re-direct all liquidation cashflows to LUSD token holders. Using this option and some other composability tricks, we developed an idea of the staBAL-LUSD pool that evolves to LUSD-a-bb-USD pool, built on top of Balancer v2, Liquity, and B.Protocol:

![Figure 2. The principal scheme of hypothetical (simulated) LUSD-a-bb-USD pool operation and its evolution from the initial staBAL-LUSD concept.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FwcVUOZn2sjtasuoZwce7.png?height=500&width=1442)

We modeled the pool as **if it actually operated on the mainnet** during the experiment and tracked the evolution of balances and trading volumes. It also included liquidations in Liquity Stability Pool, liquidity mining rewards in third-party protocols (BAL, LQTY) that we can bring to the pool utilizing asset managers, and many more.

![Figure 3. The visualization of LUSD-a-bb-USD pool operation: the pool composition (balances), liquidations, and simulated trading volume.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1DFYHKpsVlKiupvVz3YvW.png?height=712&width=1161)

The results were outstanding - this pool could generate **12% APY** in stable market conditions and up to **40% APY (25% monthly)** while the market is going downside **without additional token rewards**:

![Figure 4. LUSD-a-bb-USD bi-weekly calculated APR and its dependence on ETH price movements and yield sources allocation.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KKrwtvBfgwU2N0MsX57zP.jpg?height=1059&width=1079)

We published two articles[\[1\]](https://github.com/powerpool-finance/powerpool-research/tree/main/LUSDaUsdStablePool),[\[2\]](https://medium.com/powerpool/powerpool-introduces-first-yield-harvesting-stableswap-pool-built-using-balancer-v2-and-liquity-fed206e734b6) with results and a Github [repository](https://medium.com/powerpool/enhancing-yield-and-capital-efficiency-of-balancer-v2-liquity-lusd-pool-model-d2357cf839aa).

### Determining the parameters for optimal $TORN autocompounding in an automated governance staking vault built on top of tornado.cash.

Since one of PowerPool products is PowerAgent on-chain automation network we decided to build a smart vault for staking $TORN into tornado.cash governance staking contract.

The main issue that we need to solve was the **stochastic nature** of rewards which means that if we want to maximize compounding interest by spending a reasonable amount of gas we need to explore data and create a harvesting & compounding strategy.

For this purpose, we collected data since the new $TORN tokenomics and governance contract was launched, explored it, and propose optimal vault operation conditions.

![Figure 5. $TORN rewards daily: visualization of TORN governance staking contract on-chain data.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/h5Z9m9xtW4lugqmvL3__a.png?height=802&width=1204)

![Figure 6. Simulation of vault operation with 200,000 TORN staked; gas-adjusted profit, and gas spending.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/C2f_IbYsSN4BMlm_5pgM8.png?height=1000&width=1566)

We determined optimal operational conditions for vaults with various amounts of TORN staked taking into account real network conditions such as gas pricing.

Results are published on PowerPool resources[\[3\]](https://gov.powerpool.finance/t/proposal-53-a-smart-vault-for-tornado-cash-governance-staking/1212),[\[4\]](https://medium.com/powerpool/introducing-pptorn-an-auto-compounding-strategy-for-tornado-cash-torn-governance-staking-1bd8d78e64a0), and [Github](https://github.com/powerpool-finance/powerpool-research/tree/main/TornadoAutocompoundResearch).

Several other cases are now **in progress**, including the very important topic of **on-chain automation** (on-chain networks, signer selection algorithms, and cryptoeconomic models of operation).

## Let’s research together

We are open to research collaboration with other protocols, persons, and entities. Please, reach out to PowerPool Research's [Twitter](https://twitter.com/pwrpl_research) or research@powerpool.finance.

title:
نقشه راه فعالیت در 
 شبکه‌های لایه ۲ اتریوم - بخش اول
body:
من خیلی وقته دیگه توییت ایردراپی نمیزنم چون دوستان بسیار دیگری الان بهتر و پیگیرتر از من دارن مطلب مینویسند در این‌باره.
اما، از اون‌جایی که بخاطر $OP - $HOP - $HFT این روزها جو #ایردراپ دوباره داغ شده، میخوام روی چند مورد قبلی تاکید کنم.

لطفا اگر اشتباهی وجود داره یا مطلب تکمیلی دارید، زیر همین توییت اضافه کنید تا دوستان دیگه استفاده کنند:
<https://twitter.com/NaserESP/status/1530923800770007040>

🔥به نظرم مهم‌ترین ایردراپ‌های یکی دو سال آینده مربوط به لایه ۲های اتریوم خواهد بود که با $OP شروع شده و طی ماه‌های آینده با $ARB و ... ادامه پیدا میکنه و حتی شاهد رکوردهای جدیدی از تعداد والت‌ها و مبلغ ایردراپ خواهیم بود.

پس، حتی اگر تابحال هیچ فعالیتی نداشتید، همین امروز شروع کنید.

1️⃣ شبکه optimismPBC:
ایردراپ فعلی فقط شامل ۵٪ توکن‌ها هست و گفته شده ۱۴٪ دیگه در مراحل بعدی بین کاربران توزیع میشه. پس هنوز برای فعالیت در این شبکه دیر نشده. از بریج اصلی OP استفاده کنید و حداقل یک تراکنش در آن داشته باشید:
<https://app.optimism.io/bridge>

پس از انتقال مقداری اتریوم به این شبکه، بهتره در dappهای بومی آن در حد توان خودتون تراکنش بزنید و فعال باشید. از جمله:
synthetix_io
kwenta_io
lyrafinance
quixotic_io
PolynomialFi
perpprotocol

2️⃣ شبکه arbitrum:
مورد بعدی و حتی مهم‌تر از OP، شبکه آربیتروم هست که قراره به زودی یک کمپین در ProjectGalaxyHQ داشته باشه. ناگفته پیداست که باید تمام توان خودتون رو برای انجام تسک‌های این کمپین بگذارید.
اما نه اینکه تا اونموقع دست روی دست بگذارید و منتظر بمونید!

این روزها از طریق بریج اصلی آربیتروم و با ۳-۴ دلار فی، میتونید مقداری اتریوم به این شبکه منتقل کنید:
<https://bridge.arbitrum.io>

بعد، طبق معمول از dappهای شبکه استفاده کنید و تعداد تراکنش‌های خودتون رو بالا ببرید. از جمله میتونید مثلا روی یونی‌سواپ، سوشی و امثالهم تراکنش بزنید.
یا تعدادی دیگه از dappهای این اکوسیستم شامل:
AboardExchange
cozyfinance
yield
SlingshotCrypto
...
یکی دیگه از گزینه‌های خوب فعالیت در آربیتروم، اکوسیستم Treasure_DAO و به طور مثال بازی playbridgeworld هست که الان با هزینه ۴-۵ دلاری میشه شروع کرد!

3️⃣ شبکه zksync
به نظرم هنوز تا انتشار توکن فاصله داره و قبل از نسخه ۲ این اتفاق نمی‌افته. پس فرصت بیشتری برای استفاده و بالا بردن شانس خودتون دارید.
والت خودتون روی شبکه zkSync رو فعال کنید و از طریق بریج خودش یا دیگران مقداری دارایی بهش منتقل کنید:
<https://wallet.zksync.io>

روی نسخه ۱ این شبکه حتما تراکنش ارسال و دریافت داشته باشید. NFT بسازید. از آن برای دونیت کردن در گرنت‌های gitcoin استفاده کنید و به مرور تعداد زیادی تراکنش روی ZigZagExchange ثبت کنید.

در کنار همه اینها، کار با والت argentHQ به نظرم بسیار مهمه و باید بهش توجه کرد.

بعد برید سراغ تست‌نت zkSync 2.0:
<https://portal.zksync.io>
با بخش‌های مختلف پورتال کار کنید و تراکنش بزنید. همچنین میتونید از dappهای لیست زیر روی شبکه تست استفاده کنید:
<https://matterlabs.notion.site/zkSync-2-0-Testnet-Applications-e38328bccda7472793024a25e26a1cac>

4️⃣ شبکه استارک‌نت StarkWareLtd
این شبکه هنوز اول راهه و مسیر طولانی در پیش داره، اما از همین الان باید باهاش در ارتباط باشید تا به عنوان یکی از کاربران اولیه یا Early User شناخته بشید.
اولین مرحله اینه که والت Argent X رو نصب کنید:
<https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/argent-x/dlcobpjiigpikoobohmabehhmhfoodbb>

سپس از طریق بریج رسمی استارک‌نت، مقداری اتریوم به شبکه اصلی استارک منتقل کنید:
<https://starkgate.starknet.io>
این بریج تازه راه افتاده و محدودیت استفاده داره. باید مدام چک کنید هر وقت سقف واریزی افزایش پیدا کرد، تراکنش بزنید.
فعلا روی شبکه اصلی StarkNet هیچ dapp دیگری نیست.

در همین والت Argent X میتونید والت تست‌نت استارک‌نت رو هم فعال کنید و با dappهای شبکه تست کار کنید. از جمله:
aspectdotco
starkswap
StarkDefi
JediSwap
mySwapxyz
ZigZagExchange

(نکته مبهم برای من اینه که چرا آدرس‌های شبکه اصلی و تست‌نت استارک‌نت متفاوت هستند؟)

مورد دیگری که میتونه مفید باشه، فعالیت در پروژه‌های StarkEx هست. از جمله:
dYdX
Sorare
Immutable
deversifi

زیرساخت‌ StarkEx یکی دیگر از محصولات شرکت StarkWare هست که البته ارتباط مستقیمی با StarkNet نداره و جدای از هم هستند.

title: HyperPay 5.0焕新之旅：一个钱包满足你所有诉求
body:
从2017年HyperPay钱包成立至今，感谢一路走来支持HyperPay钱包的家人们，HyperPay团队始终牢记“安全是初心，增值是使命”，发展至今安全零事故，为用户资产创造近$5000万增值。

5\.0版本也是HyperPay钱包发展过程中的一个重要节点，在该版本中，托管钱包和自管钱包完全独立，业务拓展性更强，前端页面更为人性化，托管钱包分为简洁版和专业版，针对不同用户群体提供更友好的交互体验和服务内容。

HyperPay托管钱包由获得合规托管牌照的HyperBC进行资金托管，并定期经由慢雾科技、知道创宇、CERTIK等知名安全公司审计，全方位保障用户资产安全；自管钱包新增DeFi理财超市、热门空投、行情资讯等板块，并支持聚合Dex交易、跨链闪兑、合约安全检测、NFT收藏与分享等功能，为用户提供最理想的Web3.0钱包体验。

用户在更新5.0版本后，将可以选择自己所需的服务类型和感兴趣的业务内容，也可以在页面中自由查找感兴趣的教程、理财、行情走势及资讯。以下内容对HyperPay 5.0版本的更新内容进行简要介绍。

**邀请好友，邀请人和被邀请人立得45美金奖励**

邀请好友下载和注册HyperPay钱包，新用户在30天内完成实名注册和新手任务，邀请人和被邀请人均可获得价值45美金奖励，邀请人还可享受1级好友和2级好友的理财收益返佣。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GGK3P8pLKCHpa36mJ-Yby.jpg?height=852&width=473)

**自管钱包&托管钱包 独立模式**

HyperPay 5.0最大的变化就是托管钱包和自管钱包变成独立模式，用户可以自由切换两种模式下的使用场景，满足更多样化的需求。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FkU7_IyQSLSjf_2FQeH2g.jpg?height=1162&width=629)

接下来详细说说改版后两个钱包有什么变化。

**自管钱包|畅游DeFi世界**

自管钱包是变化最大的，去中心化体验更完整，功能也更丰富，设置了**资产，理财，swap，DApp，发现**5大板块。

**资产管理：支持30+公链及衍生资产**

HyperPay自管钱包支持30+公链及公链衍生资产，覆盖市场主流公链，用户可以添加自己需要的公链资产，无需多个钱包间切换，持有资产明细一目了然，并且在5.0版本中，用户可以进行NFT收藏与分享：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wzzJHpzh6fyhWh3_lO16N.jpg?height=1089&width=692)

**理财版块：抢占头矿先机 了然项目发展情况**

HyperPay5.0自管钱包增加了丰富的理财功能模块，挖矿、借贷、DeFi理财等多种产品满足用户的各种投资需求。喜欢DeFi的用户，可以在这儿体验一站式的理财项目，不过这还不算特色，5.0的自管钱包特别甄选了市场头部、热门DeFi项目，并通过多维度对项目进行安全检测，方便新手用户直观稳健的参与DeFi项目。用户在体验理财版块时，可以勾选自己偏好的资产，理财版块也将按照用户的偏好推荐相应的DeFi项目并展示TVL、APY等相应数据信息：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OFRUtirGnr3jF-HbfxWi0.jpg?height=1162&width=562)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KWp-z-shYInDjk_s0axqD.jpg?height=1091&width=692)

**Swap：参与DeFi更安全 资产兑换更便捷**

Swap板块是原生交易模块，由原生的DEX和跨链闪兑组成，用户在参与DEX的过程中，可以点击合约检测模块，HyperPay将帮助用户对于合约进行安全检测，根据不同的链、不同的DEX，从“貔貅盘疑似度” 、“流动池数据”、“token数据”、“合约代码”等维度来评估流动池的安全情况和综合得分，帮助用户做初步的投资辅助判断：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rLJ9y6khUsBk-fdwZV9Ru.jpg?height=1163&width=643)

跨链闪兑功能支持7条公链（ETH、BSC、FANTOM、HECO、POLYGON、OEC、AVAX）任意两个币种进行兑换，帮助用户轻松完成不同公链、不同资产之间的兑换：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/c_VYXpiocGbfwIn9KYuMv.jpg?height=1163&width=537)

**DApp：最新最全的DApp列表 点击即可参与**

优化过的DApp模块，新增了热门DApps栏目， DApps列表还增加了各板块项目的TVL排行信息，方便用户快速发现并掌握最新DeFi趋势。另外还有项目空投列表，不错过任何一个财富信息。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/D9XPk2PGOGIap_I-P3o-t.jpg?height=927&width=692)

**发现：掌握行业一手讯息**

这是新增板块，由行情模块和资讯模块组成。

**（1）行情模块**

行情模块聚合了市值榜，热门，DeFi，NFT，元宇宙，共5个主流榜单和1个空投榜组成。榜单中的代币提供了包括价格走势，该代币在dex中流动池，以及交易市场等详细数据，用户可通过点击买入/卖出按钮跳转至原生dex或跨链闪兑页面快捷交易。

 

**（**

title: InterPlanetary Filesystem (IPFS) Analysis
body:
The internet is at the foundation of all digital interactions including online businesses, digital commerce, and other social experiences on the web. The present state of the internet is based on the client-server architecture, facilitated by the Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP), which is an application protocol that runs on top of the TCP/IP suite and is used to communicate between client browsers and centralized servers. However, the increased adoption rate and exponential growth of the internet have amplified concerns regarding the sustainability, scalability, and latency of the HTTP and present-day web architecture. For instance, the centralization of servers increases inefficiencies in content delivery, since numerous files are downloaded from a central point. This consequently increases the prevalence of DDoS attacks, ISP censorship and government snooping. Other issues border around expensive bandwidth cost, file duplication leading to bloated storage, fragile history of information stored on the internet and short lifespans of webpages. These issues, have therefore, necessitated the need for a distributed and scalable web architecture. The Interplanetary File System (IPFS) fundamentally attempts to address the present deficiencies of the HTTP, through a novel peer-to-peer (p2p) file sharing model that is more scalable, and efficient. This implies that IPFS is a highly ambitious project, with profound potential impact on the future state of the internet. Hence, this research examines the main components, features, and operational mechanism of the IPFS. The real-world applications, use-cases and legal implications would also be discussed extensively. IPFS IPFS is an open-source, distributed, peer-to-peer (p2p) hypermedia protocol for accessing, storing, and sharing data, files, websites, and applications. The fundamental ideology behind the IPFS centers around transforming the way in which networks of people and computers communicate. Today's World Wide Web and HTTP model is structured on centralized ownership and access, meaning that clients only get files from whoever owns/hosts them, (if they are granted access). However, the IPFS is based on the principle of collective possession and participation, where many users (peers), possess each other’s files and collaboratively  participate in making them readily available and accessible to others.

![Figure 1 – HTTP vs IPFS Architecture \[1\]](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/McQ-do-XYyeNqKXJ6Czrm.png?height=392&width=963)

 The diagram above illustrates that the IPFS does not rely on centralized servers, as in the case of the HTTP model, but rather a client (peer) computer can be used to host and distribute web files, data, and contents. This, therefore, creates a decentralized architecture that makes it difficult to censor contents since the data, files, or webpages on IPFS can come from several points or locations. Thereby creating a more robust, resilient, and interconnected internet structure. 

Some of the main features and properties that define the Interplanetary file system are outlined in the table below: 

Table 1 – IPFS main features and properties Properties 	

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m0yfq7fioMdlCpce4cTbj.png?height=223&width=944)

How the IPFS works IPFS fundamentally works based on three (3) core components, which are:

1. Unique identification via content addressing
2. Content discovery via Distributed Hash Tables (DHTs)
3. Content linking with Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs)

## Content addressing

Instead of the location-based system used by the HTTP, which involves the use of URLs and Domain Name Servers (DNS) to route web clients requests to the servers hosting the file. The IPFS, in this case, uses **content-addressing**, in which every file or content is given a unique **Content Identifier (CID)** which is a cryptographic hash. The use of these unique content identifiers ensures that duplicates are automatically removed across the network and version history is tracked for every file. This leads to an immutable, persistently available file system where web pages or data do not disappear because of a failed server or webhost. This is mainly possible because IPFS stores the object history for all files so that all versions are accessible throughout time. Thereby, enabling configurable synchronisation of all data, files, or websites, which implies that websites would no longer be vulnerable to cyclical “404” error messages, due to downed servers or an interrupted chain of HTTP links.

The contents of an IPFS object are primarily stored in two fields which are:

         i. The data field, which is an unstructured binary data block of size of **256** **KB**.

       ii.  An array of links to other IPFS objects under the same directory which are used to increase the network efficiency.

In addition, an **Interplanetary Linked Data** **(IPLD)** system is used to translate between different hash-linked data structures. Thereby, enabling the unification and interoperability of all data, files, and contents across distributed systems within the IPFS protocol. The IPLD further provides libraries for combining pluggable modules to resolve a path, selector, or query across many linked nodes, therefore allowing users to explore data regardless of the underlying protocol.

## Content Discovery via Distributed Hash Table (DHT)

A hash table is generally described as a data structure that stores information as key/value pairs. The IPFS protocol uses [distributed hash tables](https://docs.ipfs.io/concepts/dht/) as the fundamental component for content routing to find the specific peers that are hosting the contents that a client has requested. Using distributed hash tables, data is spread across a network of computers to enable efficient access and lookup between nodes. Therefore, DHT enables decentralization and fault-tolerance since nodes do not require central coordination, which implies that the IPFS protocol can function reliably even when nodes fail or leave the network. Also, DHTs can scale to accommodate millions of nodes. This consequently results in a system that is more resilient than client-server structures.

## Content Linking with Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs)

The IPFS protocol uses the Merkle Directed Acyclic Graphs ([DAGs](https://docs.ipfs.io/concepts/how-ipfs-works/#directed-acyclic-graphs-dags)), which is simply a blend of a Merkle Tree and a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) which ensures that data blocks exchanged on p2p networks are accurate, and harmonized. This verification is done by unifying all data blocks using cryptographic hash functions. Also, the use of a Merkle DAG structure enables the creation of a **Version Control System (VCS)**, through which the IPFS stores the object history of files in a synchronized manner. A common example of this is [Github](https://github.com/), which allows developers to simultaneously collaborate on projects. Files on Github are stored and versioned using a Merkle DAG, thereby enabling other developers to independently edit versions of a file, store these versions and later merge edits with the original file.

The version control system in IPFS are further enhanced by the **Interplanetary Naming System** ([IPNS](https://docs.ipfs.io/concepts/ipns/)), which enables content linking, so that files can be accessed using the node ID address, allowing users to retrieve updated contents even without knowing the new hashes of such files. This further highlight another key characteristic of IPFS that it is a **Self-Certifying File System** which means that data served to clients is authenticated by their own filename and the node providing it.

# Applications of IPFS

Despite being a fairly new technology, the applications and use cases of the Interplanetary File System \[IPFS\] are presently being exploited in a myriad of contexts. It is, however, important to specifically highlight the symbiotic relationship between IPFS and the blockchain technology (being a distributed and interlinked immutable ledger). The combination of both technologies enhances their applications in diverse scenarios, which includes enabling off-chain storage and anonymous file sharing in a distributed manner using timestamps. This means that blockchain projects do not need to store their data or files on-chain.  Thereby reducing blockchain bloating, because IPFS provides a convenient and secure off-chain solution that can enable blockchains scale.

Although, other distributed file systems such as BitTorrent can coordinate the transfer of data between several nodes or peers, however it is mainly restricted to the torrent ecosystem. In contrast, the IPFS implements a generalised version of this protocol called BitSwap, which enables further possibilities for built-in storage platforms like [Filecoin](https://filecoin.io/). For this reason, Filecoin, a distributed storage network, is based on IPFS, where node operators are incentivized to host files and gain cryptocurrency rewards. Similarly, [Audius](https://audius.co/), which is a decentralized music service, uses the IPFS for hosting its audio files. Another notable example that highlights the practical application of the IPFS, can be seen in the case of [Pinata](https://www.pinata.cloud/), which is an NFT hosting service that uses IPFS to back up crypto collectables for partners like Rarible and Sorare.

Finally, browsers such as [Brave](https://brave.com/) and [Opera](https://www.opera.com/) presently provides native support for IPFS browsing. In this case, the Brave browser gives users an option to access IPFS content through a public gateway or their own local node. This, thereby, provides a gateway for the increased adoption of IPFS.

title: 熊市无损打新平台|Cososwap实用性分析报告
body:
## 太长不看版

可无损打新的平台，运营很久，逻辑在线，代币还没上线，生态挖矿中
请马上入手一个或多个nft
购买链接 <https://www.coso.finance/NewNFTMarket> 
参考价265u，谨慎追高，入手后捏着，七天后一起报团挖矿

## 详细分析版

项目官网 （如果打不开一定要翻墙全局，直到得出一个流畅的连接，为以后抢购做铺垫）

[https://www.coso.finance/](https://www.coso.finance/)

说明文档 （建议自己看看）

[https://docscn.coso.finance/](https://docscn.coso.finance/)

推特：

[https://twitter.com/cososwap](https://twitter.com/cososwap)

电报：

[https://t.me/cososwap](https://t.me/cososwap)

### 基本介绍

一个保底型发射器+dex+dao平台
做事比较低调，覆盖面不太广，代币发行不久，还没上线，可以介入生态
贴几个图

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/I8jm8zGqHvl4z6x0o8XVQ.jpg?height=6770&width=1080)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/petws3MZ40FgELV9IynU3.jpg?height=9690&width=1080)

### 机制

项目方来平台募资
平台用户参与抢购投资
抢购完毕后可平台内交易
平台内有自己的DEX
上线后七天内参投用户有退还投资本金的权力
可有效避免破发带来的本金损失
这意味着盈利概率非常高，起码很难亏损
平台收取项目方10%的最终募资金
完成

### 基本参与方式

购买平台的nft，锁定，获得抢购机会
拼手速抢，抢到后关注项目表现，及时套利
继续下一个，赚出nft的本金
实现零成本持续打新

### 收益率

根据历史信息来看，破发概率很低，有过十倍项目，质量还可以 比交易所打新的收益率要高很多

### 项目定位

有资金门槛的打新套利平台
要拼手速
大概率保本
大资金在操作上不太方便
更适合社区运作

### 解决几个疑问

**用户怎么可能稳赚不赔呢？到底赚了谁的钱？**

首先项目方在这个平台筹到的钱，是平台拿着，还没给项目方。
项目方并不会只在这个平台筹钱，还会在别的平台筹钱，这里只是一部分额度。
平台用户拿到相对低价的筹码，项目上线之后，就是赚市场的钱了，只不过coso平台和项目方有七天约定。

我们假设：
项目方要在coso卖500万额度
众筹500万成功，币在用户手里，等上线看表现
上线七天内，用户有权申请回购
极端条件下，币价一落千丈，用户都选择申请回购了
则币再退给项目方
假如申请回购了250万额度
平台方收取25万，项目方拿走90%225万

**平台赚谁的钱？**

平台赚项目方实际筹到的钱，实际上还是用户众筹的钱，它是个中间抽水的，别忘了还有平台各种生态的抽水和其它业务，平台是稳赚的

**项目方图个啥呢？**

项目方是来要优质流量的，持币者起码能帮着扩大影响力吧，再说了，平台方也在帮扩散啊

都是互相的，逻辑在线。

### 潜在风险

**NFT贬值**

如果市场冷淡，高价入手就有贬值风险

**平台没新项目**

也可能，但概率不大，正常发展肯定是有项目的，无非是质量问题

**平台跑路**

按现在的势头，平台卖了5281张nft 5281\*199=1050919u 660万跑路意思不大 还有盈利能力和后续生态，为啥不继续干？

**抢不上额度**

是个实际问题 随着用户增加，抢购难度增加 现在几十秒就空，还算可以吧

### DAO

**平台代币六月上线，正在质押产出中**

代币符号：COT
链：币安智能链（BEP-20）
最大供应量：36,536,000
初始供应：5,000,000
产出：1/S
合约地址：0x0c29fc787e4995F8F1F14ff4C561FB9294f58c4A
COSO NFT质押挖矿：30%
LP农场：30%
推荐计划：2%
交易挖矿：5%
团队：8%
紧急预案储备：25%

**怎么获得？参与NFT质押。**

你可以把自己的卡绑在别人的金卡下质押，按比例分80%的COT，绑谁的无所谓。

合格的金卡会得到这部分的20%代币。

**那这20%为什么不能咱们社区自己拿呢？**

那先得有个金卡

**金卡怎么获得？**

一张nft卡可以申请临时激活成金卡，原卡直接销毁
当邀请绑定到20张NFT时，投票绑定者获得收益
但是这个金卡没有任何实际作用，除非投票绑定够50张NFT，金卡所有者可以获得额外20%的收益
提醒，绑定的NFT参与者，会锁仓30天
绑定以后，才能参与发射台抢额度

不建议自己干一套，号太多，麻烦

## 操作建议

### 第一阶段

各位开始慢慢购入NFT，根据自己的仓位，选择数量，当前地板价265U，扎堆购入容易把价格抬上去 持续七天，七天后，一起开启社区玩法 七天内请不要质押到dao中，会锁定30天

### 第二阶段

够20张NFT后，我们马上销毁一张NFT，然后获得代币收益，尽快保证早开始挖坑

### 第三阶段

50张NFT达成，一张金卡 大家一起做个“节点” 拿出金卡收益的一部分 按比例分给投票者 剩下的分给社区运营人员 具体分配方案待定

## 跟社区的好处

额外的代币获得

及时的信息提醒

后续的各种权益

title: LooksRare V.S. X2Y2: Who Will Unseat the Monopoly by Issuing Token?
body:
Author : @CryptoScott_ETH, @RealResearch_DAO


The emergence of NFT has created a new digital consumption and investment scene. As an information intermediary, NFT Marketplaces play an impotent role in the NFT’s industry chain. Opensea, the leading NFT marketplace occupying 99% market share, plans to go public, drawing backlash from collectors and Crypto communities who want an Opensea token drop instead. Seizing the opportunity, more and more competitors are springing up, trying to unseat the monopoly by issuing token. Among them, LooksRare and X2Y2 have attracted a lot of attention recently. In this article, we will compare LooksRare and X2Y2 in all aspects.

## 1. Tokenomics 

### 1.1 Token Allocation

![The Allocation of LOOKS and X2Y2 token, source: LooksRare, X2Y2](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bm17vyC-eTpjeuzn37sFA.png?height=328&width=704)

The token allocations of them are roughly the same. The first biggest difference is the Presale and the second is the liquidity management.

**Strategic Sale / Presale**

* LooksRare: 33,000,000 (3.3% of total supply) LOOKS, the native token of LooksRare, were sold for 69 KOLs found as early investors and the price is unknown. 
* X2Y2: 15,000,000 (1.5% of total supply) X2Y2, the native token of X2Y2, divided into 1,000 shares (15,000 X2Y2 per share), each sold for 1.5 ETH through Initial Liquidity Offering (ILO). A total of 1,500 ETH was raised. The participants of ILO were able to mint AYOR, an NFT Collection issuing by X2Y2, for free. The price of ETH at the ILO was $3,000, meaning that the presale price of X2Y2 was $0.3.

**Liquidity Management**

* LooksRare: 17,000,000 (1.7% of total supply) LOOKS are allocated to Liquidity Management. At the beginning, 5,000,000(0.5%) LOOKS token was used to incentivize liquidity for the LOOKS token by giving rewards for users that stake LOOKS-ETH Uni LP tokens over the next 70 days. The remaining 12,000,000(1.2%) tokens may be paired with ETH and deposited into Uniswap as the initial liquidity. As more and more CEX, such as FTX and OKX, listed LOOKS, the team discontinued the Liquidity Rewards Program on day 37 (Approximately 2022/02/15) and reallocate the leftover tokens to pair with ETH to add as Uniswap liquidity themselves. 
* X2Y2: 15,000,000 (1.5% of total supply) X2Y2 are allocated to Liquidity Management. 10,000,000 (1%) X2Y2 tokens + 1,500 ETH raising from ILO were deposited into Uniswap to bootstrap the initial liquidity, meaning that the initial market price of X2Y2 was $0.45.  The LP tokens generated by bootstrapping liquidity were burned to lock the liquidity permanently. The remaining 5,000,000 (0.5%) X2Y2 are used to incentivize liquidity for the X2Y2 token by giving rewards for users that stake X2Y2-ETH Uni LP tokens.

### 1.2 Release Schedule

![Release Schedule of LOOKS Token, Source: LooksRare](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/slDvlAo-J5wwzCx9ME-1a.png?height=412&width=916)

![Release Schedule of X2Y2 Token, Source: X2Y2](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/S9DxHCV-atO7ioDKLuOWt.png?height=514&width=1018)

**Presale / Strategic Sale** 

* X2Y2: **unlocked linearly per block in 360 days**. 
* LooksRare: **locked until day 180(Approximately 2022/07/11)**. 

It is noteworthy that, both can share the trading fee in WETH, no matter if they are locked or unlocked. 

**Trading Reward** 

* *LooksRare: 4 phases with differing reward rates* 30 days（1/11-2/9），90 days（2/10-5/11），240 days（5/12-2023/1/7），361 days（2023/1/8-2024/1/3）

![Trading Rewards of LooksRare, Source: LooksRare](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/gDfHsmUw5Atp8FJNp0bim.png?height=185&width=616)

* X2Y2: unlocked linearly per block in 720 days.

![Trading Rewards of X2Y2, Source: X2Y2](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ru6-trFL808BntFFEVq1K.png?height=118&width=628)

The trading reward decays successively like LooksRare will have a certain impact on the trading volume and the price of LOOKS token during each phase change. Unlocked linearly per block in total trading reward period like X2Y2 can avoid the impact. 

### 1.3 Strategy to Incentive Trading Volume 

There are two strategies to incentive trading volume 

* Trading Rewards: bilateral Incentive, incentive buy side and sell side. 
* Listing Rewards: unilateral incentive, just incentive sell side. 

**LooksRare** 

* Trading rewards → Trading rewards + Listing rewards 
  * Trading Rewards: 2022/01/11 - 2022/04/19, buyers and sellers receive equal incentives based on the weighted average distribution of trading volume.
  * Trading Rewards + Listing Rewards: 2022/4/20 - , In the second stage, 250,000 will be allocated from the 1,361,587.5 trading rewards for listing rewards; the third stage will continue with Listing Rewards, with 200,000 per day, of which 100,000 is obtained from the original Trading Rewards, and the other 100,000 is obtained from Treasury ( 5/12-6/11). After June 11th, the Treasury part will be adjusted according to the situation. 

X2Y2 

* Listing Rewards → Trading Rewards 
  * Listing Rewards: 2022/02/15 - 2022/03/31, Using Complex formulas with centralized parameters leads to frequent reward errors. 
  * Gas Rebate for Sales: 2022/04/1 - 2022/04/30, Cancel Listing Rewards, and instead reward based on Gas spent on trading. 
  * Trading Rewards for Sales: 2022/05/1-2022/05/13, Rewards are allocated to sellers based on trading fees. 
  * Trading Rewards for Buyers and Sellers: 2022/05/14 - , Sellers can share 604,902.80 X2Y2 tokens based on trading fees, and the remaining 20,000.00 X2Y2 tokens go to buyers, based on points (AYOR holders can boost points). 

From the incentive strategies of them, it can be seen that everyone is more inclined to incentivize the sell side. X2Y2 currently has more tokens used for rewards every day that it can change the incentive policy more flexibly. 

### 1.4 Token Value Capture 

**Sharing Trading Fees Revenue** 

Both of LooksRare and X2Y2 share 100% of trading fees revenue with their token holders who lock LOOKS / X2Y2 tokens in the Staking Pool. 

**Earning Staking Rewards** 

* LooksRare: Divided into four phases, the first phase rewards 1,228,500 LOOKS per day, and the reward is halved for each new stage.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ypjD7YMo-egxAigLDwsdC.png?height=189&width=692)

* X2Y2 
  * Plan: Divided into four phases, the first phase rewards 1,235,000 X2Y2 per day, and the reward is halved for each new stage. 
  * Reality: Due to the wrong parameter setting, 56% of the staking rewards were distributed in the first phase. X2Y2 had to lower the rewards of the third and fourth stages.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2bXMrBjpelWviQ_Z_V1Y4.png?height=196&width=671)

**Others** 

* X2Y2: Investors who participated the ILO can mint an AYOR NFT for free. The AYOR holders can enjoy more benefits in the future which may dilute token holders’ equity. 

## 2. Material Events 

**LooksRare** 

* 2022/1/11: NFT Marketplace and Token launch; The first stage of trading rewards was started, with 2,866,500 Looks/day; Trading volume surpasses Opensea; FTX lists LOOKS spot and perpetual futures. 
* 2022/1/13: OKX lists LOOKS for spot trading. 
* 2022/2/8: The team has transferred 23116WETH ($73M) to the Tornado, a decentralized protocol for private transactions, which was fermented in the media. 
* 2022/2/10: Phase 2 of rewards begins. 
* 2022/3/30: Stakers can automatically compound WETH rewards into LOOKS tokens by LOOKS Compounder. 
* 2022/5/12: Phase 3 of rewards begins.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2iEMd0AzcgHw-H29UA5Iu.png?height=529&width=844)

**X2Y2** 

* 2022/2/4: X2Y2 Beta Launch，0 trading fees & 0 royalties. 
* 2022/2/6: Update tokenomics. 
* 2022/2/14: ILO. 
* 2022/2/15: Add Liquidity to Uniswap and burn the LP. 
* 2022/2/15: Official Launch, 2% trading fees. 
* 2022/2/16: Pause Airdrop claim due to some errors. 
* 2022/2/18: Reopen Airdrop claim and update the requirements for the claim. 
* 2022/2/18: @bitfish1, a Chinese crypto influencer, questions the security of X2Y2’s smart contract. 
* 2022/2/19: Update smart contract and apologize to the community. 
* 2022/3/3: Listing Rewards claim period extends to 14 days, and the rewards not claimed within 14 days will be burnt. 
* 2022/3/12: Update the algorithm of Listing Rewards. 
* 2022/3/18: Staking Reward Investigation Report shows that 56% of Staking Rewards has been allocated to staker in the first stage due to calculation error. 
* 2022/3/26: Burn 16 million X2Y2 tokens which haven’t been claimed within 14 days period. 
* 2022/3/30: Airdrop claim expires and there are still 91,956,222 X2Y2 tokens haven’t been claimed. The ownership of the Airdrop contract has been burnt meaning that the tokens will never circulate. 
* 2022/4/1: Listing Rewards is replaced by Gas Rebate. 0 platform fee for sellers in April. 
* 2022/5/1: Gas Rebate is replaced by Trading Rewards. 0.5% platform fee for sellers in May.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hjbYoILMdYk4S_D837wz-.png?height=506&width=859)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Mtz0HfVIc9yN-gcOHglw_.png?height=532&width=856)

## 3. Competitive Strategy 

Compared to Opensea, LooksRare and X2Y2 both have NFT scarcity display, bulk purchase bulk shelf, Ethereum chat room and make offers to the entire Collection.

* LooksRare competes mainly by optimizing its product strategy 
  * Auto-refresh Activity, easy for users to keep an eye on sniper sweeps 
  * Collection creation with manifold which can be easier to issue on-chain NFT (NFT issued by Opensea's Lazy mint will not be on-chain until it is sold). 
  * One click to higher the selling price.
* X2Y2 competes by optimizing the product and price war strategy 
  * Trading fees as low as 0.5%, and may rise gradually according to price elasticity subsequently. 
  * To get traffic from the project side, it requires NFT project go to X2Y2 to set royalties so that the project side could receive royalties. The majority of blue-chip NFT project currently do not set royalties, so users trading in X2Y2 can save money. 
  * Different collections can be added to the shopping cart and purchased with one click. 
  * Private Sale, designated user specified price for trading, free of fees and royalties forever (equivalent to OTC) 
  * Warning that this NFT may not be traded on Opensea.

## 4. Valuation Analysis

### 4.1 LooksRare Valuation Analysis 

Since there are a large number of wash trades, it is necessary to restore the real trading data, providing two methods to restore. 

* *Filter out trades where the same NFT was traded back and forth between two wallets.* After filtering the wash trades, the highest daily trading volume reached 70 M, currently maintained at about 2 - 5 M.

![LooksRare Wash Trades Filtering, Source: DuneAnalytics(@hildobby)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TWJQW3Usv8jmwwZBbvMRv.png?height=397&width=1104)

* *Excluding trades without royalties*, it peaked at 70 M at the end of April and is currently holding at 2 - 5 M.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KTBxnDyX6bUHJjJsMpiW0.png?height=395&width=1096)

Comparison of Opensea and LooksRare valuations after filtering the wash trades.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/b7xOAhDAfmWNRrGjPFvUS.png?height=232&width=906)

LooksRare trading volume without the wash trades is 10% of Opensea, relative valuation method estimates LOOKS valuation at 13.3 B \* 10% \* 80% = 1.064 B. Since now and the start of phase 3 Trading Rewards which will last 240 days, there will be no price impact brought by Trading Rewards halving in the short term. Therefore, LOOKS valuation is cheaper than Opensea.

### 4.2 X2Y2

Since most of X2Y2's blue-chip Collections do not have royalties, it is not possible to restore the real trading data by excluding trades without royalties, and both of them have Trading Rewards incentive, so we compare LooksRare’s and X2Y2’s total trading volume with the wash trades. 

***Wash Trading Analysis*** 

* X2Y2 Daily share of 604,902.80 X2Y2 for sellers and 20,000.00 X2Y2 for buyers, i.e. only 3.3% rewarding buyers negligibly, equivalent to unilateral rewarding sellers. 
* Looks Buyer and Seller share 437,468.75 LOOKS per day and listing share 200,000 LOOKS.

In X2Y2, only the seller can receive the reward. In Looks, buyers and sellers can receive the reward based on trading volume. Therefore, for the same reward case, Looks can reduce half of the trading operations.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ErmCKys7eY2DMjya8eaC3.png?height=256&width=706)

* Breakeven Trading Volume: 
  * LooksRare = 290,233.125 / 2 / 2% = 7,255,828.12 
  * X2Y2 = 124,980.56 / 0.5% = 24,996,112 

With the same trading reward, X2Y2 contributes more volume (*LooksRare:X2Y2 = 75%:25%*) and more wash trading migrates to X2Y2 after the end of LooksRare phase 2 Trading Rewards (2022/5/11), and this situation is sustainable.

![LooksRare & X2Y2 Volume, Source: DuneAnalytics(@cryptuschrist)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WfAe5Tl3LAUlI35jqTS_r.png?height=426&width=1454)

***Valuation multiple comparison***

The token incentive policy of both sides will not change much for a long time, so we will take the recent trading data for comparison, *with the current daily trading volume of 5k ETH for LooksRare and 10k ETH for X2Y2.*

![LooksRare & X2Y2 Volume, Source: DuneAnalytics(@cryptuschrist)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XuzVx9dr1Q_HHxvUyMHOO.png?height=226&width=1268)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/CpM0z-9Uhh24TsZrvCwR7.png?height=362&width=765)

X2Y2 trading fees is cheaper compared to LooksRare. The fee can be adjusted later based on the measured price elasticity. the fee change may affect the trading volume, but it has little impact on the overall revenue, so the current revenue is considered sustainable. Therefore, X2Y2 valuation is cheaper than LooksRare.

## Summary

* Since LooksRare and X2Y2 were launched, they have seized a part of Opensea’s market share. We believe that issuing tokens is an effective way to unseat the giants. 
* From the tokenomics, the four-stage trading rewards of LooksRare has a large impact on trading volume, while the rewards of X2Y2 are smoother that have less impact on it; both exchanges are focusing on incentivizing the sellers' market. 
* In terms of material events, X2Y2 has had several “black swan events” that have caused the token price to overshoot. 
* In terms of competitive strategy, LooksRare mainly through product optimization strategy, X2Y2 through not only product optimization but also price war strategy. Noteworthily, X2Y2 has a new traffic channel by asking NFT project owners to set royalties. 
* The Valuations of LooksRare and X2Y2 are much cheaper than Opensea’s, therefore, there is a possibility of underestimation of them. LooksRare has gained the support of some KOLs and exchanges and has a certain popularity, while X2Y2 has less popularity and hasn’t been listed on major exchange, so there is more room for growth than LooksRare. 

## Risk Warning 

* A bear market with less than expected growth in the NFT market. 
* Fierce competition in the industry and less-than-expected platform revenues. 
* Black swan events due to potential contract security risks.

## What is PipeMail?

PipeMail is an email Dapp in web3.0.

PipeMail is based on blockchain public network (Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, etc.) and distributed storage technology (IPFS).

PipeMail uses the blockchain public network to store email metadata (recipients, senders, etc.), and the content of emails (body, attachments, etc.) will be stored in distributed storage (IPFS) in the form of files. Blockchain and IPFS make it possible for anyone to send/view emails at any time, and emails are never lost.
